00032                 aList.size();

00034                 System.out.println("\nFinal Version");
00035                 for (ProtoObject obj : aList) {
00036                         String type = obj.eClass().getName();
00037                         //System.out.format("%s: %s\n", type, obj);
00038                         System.out.format("%2d: %s, %s\n", x, type, obj.getName());
00039                         int id = obj.eClass().getClassifierID();
00040                         switch (id) {
00041                                 case SimulinkPackage.LINE: {
00042                                         Line line = (Line) obj;
00043                                         System.out.format("\t%s --> %s\n", 
00044                                                         line.getSimuNameSrc(), line.getSimuNameDst());
00045                                 }
